de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.churn
Interface ChurnModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExponentialChurnModel, StaticChurnModel
public interface ChurnModel

The churn model describes the churn behavior of peers within a simulation run. For instance, simple distribution such as exponential, lognormal or even more complex models are conceivable.

Version:
3.0, 12/03/2007
Author:
Sebastian Kaune, Konstantin Pussep

Method Detail

getNextUptime

long getNextUptime(Host host)
Gets the next uptime of a given host. The uptime defines the time how long the given host will stay online.

Parameters:
host - the specified host
Returns:
time to stay online

getNextDowntime

long getNextDowntime(Host host)
Gets the next downtime of a given host. The downtime defines the time how long the given host will stay offline.

Parameters:
host - the specified host
Returns:
time to stay offline

prepare

void prepare(java.util.List<Host> churnHosts)
Invoking this method prepares the churn model for its future activation. All relevant information can be accessed by the given list of existing hosts which will be affected by churn

Parameters:
churnHosts - the host which will be affected by churn
